name: FastMCP
instructions: This provides a natural language to SQL Model Context Protocol server that helps convert natural language queries into SQL statements.

tools.name: plan_query_for_intent
tools.description:
Plan a SQL solution for a natural-language request.

Returns minimal schema context, a join plan, and a draft query so an LLM
can proceed directly to execution or ask for clarifications.

request.description: User's question or goal in natural language. Example: 'Total revenue by month for 2024 for the US region.'
request.title: Request

detail_level.description: Controls planning verbosity; 'full' returns more columns/joins.
detail_level.title: Detail Level

budget.description: Optional response-size caps. Keys: tables, columns_per_table, sample_values. Example: {tables: 5, columns_per_table: 20, sample_values: 3}.
budget.title: Budget

tools.name: get_database_overview
tools.description: Summarize schemas and key areas to orient query planning.

include_subject_areas.description: Include structured subject area data when true
include_subject_areas.title: Include Subject Areas

area_limit.description: Maximum number of subject areas to include
area_limit.title: Area Limit

tools.name: get_table_info
tools.description: Explain a table's purpose, columns, relationships, and representative values.

include_samples.description: Include representative sample values for columns
include_samples.title: Include Samples

column_role_filter.description: If provided, only return columns with these business roles
column_role_filter.title: Column Role Filter

max_sample_values.description: Maximum samples per column when samples are included
max_sample_values.title: Max Sample Values

relationship_limit.description: Limit the number of relationships returned
relationship_limit.title: Relationship Limit

tools.name: get_init_status
tools.description: Get initialization status with descriptive progression for LLMs/UIs.

tools.name: get_subject_areas
tools.description: List subject areas detected in the database.

limit.description: Maximum number of areas to return
limit.title: Limit

tools.name: execute_query
tools.description: Safely execute a SELECT and return results with guidance for next steps.

sql.description: SQL statement to execute. SELECT-only; non-SELECT returns a structured error.
sql.title: Sql
